---
title: "About Kolkata"
---

Kolkata or the "City of Joy" is a metropolis located in the Eastern state of India - West Bengal. Long known as the cultural and gastronomic capital of the country, Kolkata is well connected by Rail, Road and Air with the rest of the country and other Asian nations.

Please read the wikipedia entry for the city [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kolkata "About Kolkata"){target="_blank"}.
